room_title: Escape room "The Bank Heist" by Rugged Xscape in Lafayette (IN)
room_description: The infamous Mad Dog Anderson has called on some of the stealthiest and most dangerous outlaws he could find – you. He has been scoping out the bank and you have only 60 minutes to get in there, get into the vault, and steal the gold. Be careful though, there is some new fangled contraption that he has never seen before. Get caught – and it’s the stockades for the lot of you!
